args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Insufficient Air Volume in Brake System/FMVSS 121

Autocar, LLC (Autocar) is recalling certain 2023-2024 DC (Legend) vehicles.  The air tanks have an insufficient volume of air for the brake system.  As such, these vehicles fail to comply with the requirements of Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard number 121, "Air Brake Systems."Insufficient air volume can reduce brake function, extending the distance required to stop and increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 5.0
